title: Challenger Jacket
body:
Hey Riot 

Am no Challenger ranked player this season but i love the jacket you guys created for the challengers 
will i be able to purchase it though anywhere when you release it??

Am talking about this one

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/challenger-banner.jpg?itok=Y0bnjSjx

replies.body:
These jackets will **not** be purchasable. The [official announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2016-challenger-rewards) states

>"These jackets will only be obtainable through playing Ranked this year. "

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UV2UT2Tz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-13T22:50:28.280+0000)
>
> These jackets will **not** be purchasable. The [official announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2016-challenger-rewards) states
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions.

I have been playing rank this year 1700 games to be honest 

That means i can get it??

> [{quoted}](name=le monpudding53,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UV2UT2Tz,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-14T00:09:21.588+0000)
>
> Are you challenger?

No am not challenger

Check out our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h8), which goes over Challenger Tier and how it compares to others.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Will the jackets only be for those who ended the 2016 season as Challenger, or for anyone who managed to reach Challenger in the 2016 season? Hopefully its the latter :)

> [{quoted}](name=Maulface,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UV2UT2Tz,comment-id=000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-10-21T03:25:21.859+0000)
>
> Will the jackets only be for those who ended the 2016 season as Challenger, or for anyone who managed to reach Challenger in the 2016 season? Hopefully its the latter :)

It's only the top 200 as well.

Ranked Rewards are for the ranked Tier you *end the season at*. You won't receive rewards for the Tier you *peaked at during the season*. 

I hope that clarified this for you.
Well then you don't rate fam
Are the Jackets only for NA server challenger players or are they available for more regions?
The announcement seems to hint at all Regions, as it references QQ/Garena being routes we take to announce winners on certain regions.

Hi i am from LAN region, I see a lot of NA players come to LAN region to play ranked to get easily challenger, Are they still possible to get the jacket or people that actually live in Lan gets the jacket

Yes, if someone residing in NA created an account on another region such as LAN and reached either the top 200 in Challenger Tier or the top 5 ranked teams on the region, they would be eligible for earning the Jacket.

I hope that cleared this up for you.
If you are wanting one of these jackets then they will be on Ebay down the road in a couple  of months {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=MortalKellogs,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UV2UT2Tz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-07T22:49:12.762+0000)
>
> If you are wanting one of these jackets then they will be on Ebay down the road in a couple  of months {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Yeah that's what i thought :)
